content: 1 Jude, bondman of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to the called ones beloved in God the Father and preserved in Jesus Christ:
content_old: 1 Jude, bondman of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to the called ones beloved in God the Father and preserved in Jesus Christ:

content: 2 Mercy to you, and peace, and love be multiplied.
content_old: 2 Mercy to you, and peace, and love be multiplied.

content: 3 Beloved, using all diligence to write to you of our common salvation, I have been obliged to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith once delivered to the saints.
content_old: 3 Beloved, using all diligence to write to you of our common salvation, I have been obliged to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith once delivered to the saints.

content: 4 For certain men have got in unnoticed, they who of old were marked out beforehand to this sentence, ungodly persons, turning the grace of our God into dissoluteness, and denying our only Master and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 4 For certain men have got in unnoticed, they who of old were marked out beforehand to this sentence, ungodly persons, turning the grace of our God into dissoluteness, and denying our only Master and Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 5 But I would put you in remembrance, you who once knew all things, that the Lord, having saved a people out of the land of Egypt, in the second place destroyed those who had not believed.
content_old: 5 But I would put you in remembrance, you who once knew all things, that the Lord, having saved a people out of the land of Egypt, in the second place destroyed those who had not believed.

content: 6 And angels who had not kept their own original state, but had abandoned their own dwelling, he keeps in eternal chains under gloomy darkness, to the judgment of the great day;
content_old: 6 And angels who had not kept their own original state, but had abandoned their own dwelling, he keeps in eternal chains under gloomy darkness, to the judgment of the great day;

content: 7 as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities around them, committing greedily fornication, in like manner with them, and going after other flesh, lie there as an example, undergoing the judgment of eternal fire.
content_old: 7 as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities around them, committing greedily fornication, in like manner with them, and going after other flesh, lie there as an example, undergoing the judgment of eternal fire.

content: 8 Yet in like manner these dreamers also defile the flesh, and despise lordship, and speak railingly against dignities.
content_old: 8 Yet in like manner these dreamers also defile the flesh, and despise lordship, and speak railingly against dignities.

content: 9 But Michael the archangel, when disputing with the devil he reasoned about the body of Moses, did not dare to bring a railing judgment against him, but said, The Lord rebuke thee.
content_old: 9 But Michael the archangel, when disputing with the devil he reasoned about the body of Moses, did not dare to bring a railing judgment against him, but said, The Lord rebuke thee.

content: 10 But these, whatever things they know not, they speak railingly against; but what even, as the irrational animals, they understand by mere nature, in these things they corrupt themselves.
content_old: 10 But these, whatever things they know not, they speak railingly against; but what even, as the irrational animals, they understand by mere nature, in these things they corrupt themselves.

content: 11 Woe to them! because they have gone in the way of Cain, and given themselves up to the error of Balaam for reward, and perished in the gainsaying of Core.
content_old: 11 Woe to them! because they have gone in the way of Cain, and given themselves up to the error of Balaam for reward, and perished in the gainsaying of Core.

content: 12 These are spots in your love-feasts, feasting together with you without fear, pasturing themselves; clouds without water, carried along by the winds; autumnal trees, without fruit, twice dead, rooted up;
content_old: 12 These are spots in your love-feasts, feasting together with you without fear, pasturing themselves; clouds without water, carried along by the winds; autumnal trees, without fruit, twice dead, rooted up;

content: 13 raging waves of the sea, foaming out their own shames; wandering stars, to whom has been reserved the gloom of darkness for eternity.
content_old: 13 raging waves of the sea, foaming out their own shames; wandering stars, to whom has been reserved the gloom of darkness for eternity.

content: 14 And Enoch, the seventh from Adam, prophesied also as to these, saying, Behold, the Lord has come amidst his holy myriads,
content_old: 14 And Enoch, the seventh from Adam, prophesied also as to these, saying, Behold, the Lord has come amidst his holy myriads,

content: 15 to execute judgment against all; and to convict all the ungodly of them of all their works of ungodliness, which they have wrought ungodlily, and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.
content_old: 15 to execute judgment against all; and to convict all the ungodly of them of all their works of ungodliness, which they have wrought ungodlily, and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.

content: 16 These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their lusts; and their mouth speaks swelling words, admiring persons for the sake of profit.
content_old: 16 These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their lusts; and their mouth speaks swelling words, admiring persons for the sake of profit.

content: 17 But ye, beloved, remember the words spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ,
content_old: 17 But ye, beloved, remember the words spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ,

content: 18 that they said to you, that at the end of the time there should be mockers, walking after their own lusts of ungodlinesses.
content_old: 18 that they said to you, that at the end of the time there should be mockers, walking after their own lusts of ungodlinesses.

content: 19 These are they who set themselves apart, natural men, not having the Spirit.
content_old: 19 These are they who set themselves apart, natural men, not having the Spirit.

content: 20 But ye, beloved, building yourselves up on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit,
content_old: 20 But ye, beloved, building yourselves up on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit,

content: 21 keep yourselves in the love of God, awaiting the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.
content_old: 21 keep yourselves in the love of God, awaiting the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.

content: 22 And of some have compassion, making a difference,
content_old: 22 And of some have compassion, making a difference,

content: 23 but others save with fear, snatching them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.
content_old: 23 but others save with fear, snatching them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.

content: 24 But to him that is able to keep you without stumbling, and to set you with exultation blameless before his glory,
content_old: 24 But to him that is able to keep you without stumbling, and to set you with exultation blameless before his glory,
